text: Hi..kids have you seen shapes rolling pie.
As I rider on the country shapes go a rolling pie.
Little squares and triangles and circle go a rolling pie.
They love to run around the country side and look so very colourful.
They love to hap and skip and jump and sing have a time so wonderful..
As I rider on the country shapes go a rolling pie.
Little ovals and rectangles and diamonds a go rolling pie..
They love to run around the country side and look so very colourful.
They love to hap and skip and jump and sing have a time so wonderful..
As I rider on the country shapes go a rolling pie.
Little hearts and triangles and star go a rolling pie
They love to run around the country side and look so very colourfull.
They love to hap and skip and jump and sing have a time so wonderful..
See you next time with bob the train.
